name: MySQL5

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS` = 'active' AND DELETED ='0')
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: ACTIVEBUGCNT

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS`='active' AND DELETED = '0')
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: ACTIVESTORYCNT

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND DELETED = '0')
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: BUGCNT

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: t1.`CODE`
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: CODE

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (SELECT t.name FROM zt_project t,zt_projectproduct t2 WHERE t.id=t2.project and t2.product = t1.id limit 1)
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: CURRPROJECT

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: t1.`DELETED`
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: DELETED

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND STAGE = 'developing' AND DELETED = '0')
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: DEVELOPINGSTORYCNT

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: t1.`ID`
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: ID

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: t1.`NAME`
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: NAME

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_RELEASE WHERE PRODUCT= t1.`ID` AND  `STATUS`= 'normal' AND DELETED = '0')
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: NORMALRELEASECNT

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS` <> 'closed' AND DELETED = '0')
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: NOTCLOSEDBUGCNT

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: t1.`order`
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: ORDER1

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND STAGE = 'planned' AND DELETED ='0')
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: PLANNEDSTORYCNT

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_PROJECT t2 LEFT JOIN ZT_PROJECTPRODUCT t ON t2.ID = t.project WHERE t.PRODUCT = t1.id AND t2.DELETED = '0' and t2.`status` in( 'wait','doing') and t2.`END` < now() )
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: POSTPONEDPROJECTCNT

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_PRODUCTPLAN WHERE PRODUCT= t1.`ID` AND DELETED = '0')
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: PRODUCTPLANCNT

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_RELEASE WHERE PRODUCT= t1.`ID` AND DELETED = '0')
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: RELEASECNT

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND STAGE = 'released' AND DELETED = '0')
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: RELEASEDSTORYCNT

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_PROJECT LEFT JOIN ZT_PROJECTPRODUCT ON  ZT_PROJECT.ID = ZT_PROJECTPRODUCT.project WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND DELETED = '0')
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: RESPROJECTCNT

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: t1.`STATUS`
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: STATUS

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND DELETED = '0')
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: STORYCNT

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND STAGE = 'testing' AND DELETED = '0')
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: TESTINGSTORYCNT

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: t1.`TYPE`
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: TYPE

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `CONFIRMED` = 0 AND DELETED = '0')
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: UNCONFIRMBUGCNT

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_PROJECT LEFT JOIN ZT_PROJECTPRODUCT ON  ZT_PROJECT.ID = ZT_PROJECTPRODUCT.project WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS` <> 'closed' AND DELETED = '0')
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: UNDONERESPROJECTCNT

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_PRODUCTPLAN WHERE PRODUCT= t1.`ID`  AND `END` > CURDATE() AND DELETED = '0')
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: UNENDPRODUCTPLANCNT

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND STAGE = 'wait' AND DELETED = '0')
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: WAITSTORYCNT

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID`  AND DELETED = '0' and resolvedDate BETWEEN CONCAT(YEAR(DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -1 day)),'-',month(DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -1 day)),'-',day(DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -1 day)),' 00:00:00') and CONCAT(YEAR(DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -1 day)),'-',month(DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -1 day)),'-',day(DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -1 day)),' 23:59:59'))
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: YESTERDAYCLOSEDBUGCNT

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS` = 'closed' AND DELETED = '0' and CLOSEDDATE BETWEEN CONCAT(YEAR(DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -1 day)),'-',month(DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -1 day)),'-',day(DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -1 day)),' 00:00:00') and CONCAT(YEAR(DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -1 day)),'-',month(DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -1 day)),'-',day(DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -1 day)),' 23:59:59'))
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: YESTERDAYRESOLVEDBUGCNT

queryCode:
SELECT t1.id,t1.`name`,t1.RESPROJECTCNT,ROUND(IFNULL(t2.haveconsumed,0),2)  as haveconsumed from (
SELECT t1.id,t1.`name`,COUNT(1) as RESPROJECTCNT from zt_product t1 LEFT JOIN zt_projectproduct t2 on t1.id = t2.product LEFT JOIN zt_project t3 on t3.id = t2.project 
where t3.deleted = '0' and t1.deleted = '0'
GROUP BY t1.id) t1 
LEFT JOIN (
SELECT t1.id,t1.`name`,SUM(t4.consumed) as haveconsumed from zt_product t1 LEFT JOIN zt_projectproduct t2 on t1.id = t2.product LEFT JOIN zt_project t3 on t3.id = t2.project LEFT JOIN zt_task 
t4 on t4.project = t3.id 
where t3.deleted = '0' and t1.deleted = '0' and t3.deleted = '0' and t4.parent >= 0
GROUP BY t1.id ) t2 on t1.id = t2.id
